author: diguida
body:
This PR removes the access to CondDBv1 code from `Configuration/AlCa` (i.e. no GT and GT customisations on top of `CondDBv1`, `Configuration/StandardSequences` (i.e. no access to old GT account), and `Configuration/Applications` (i.e. `cmsDriver`).
@ggovi to watch
title: Dropped references to CondDBv1 in Configuration.
